decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations, comprising the installation of two rooflights to the front roof slope, would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - INFORMATIVE
The applicant should be aware that the site may provide a useful habitat for swifts. Swifts are currently in decline in the UK and in order to encourage and improve the conservation of swifts the applicant is advised to consider the installation of swift nesting box/bricks on site.

Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE
Building Regulations 
Please note that this is a lawful development certificate only and you may also require approval under the Building Regulations. If you are in any doubt about this you can get further information via https://www.merton.gov.uk/planning-and-buildings/building-control  or by emailing building.control@merton.gov.uk.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE
The applicant is reminded that under the requirements of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and the Ministry of Housing Communities & Local Government Permitted development rights for householders Technical Guidance, September 2019, materials used for facing a dormer should appear to be of similar colour and design to the materials used in the main roof of the house when viewed from ground level.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A  HIP TO GABLE AND REAR DORMER ROOF EXTENSION WITH THE INSTALLATION OF 2 x ROOFLIGHTS TO TH EFRONT ROOFSLOPE
